      • Account

        public Account()

    • Method Detail

      • addSubAccount

        public String addSubAccount(String email,
                            String password,
                            String confirmPassword,
                            Boolean requiresEmailCredits,
                            Boolean enableLitmusTest,
                            Boolean requiresLitmusCredits,
                            int maxContacts,
                            Boolean enablePrivateIPRequest,
                            Boolean sendActivation,
                            String returnUrl,
                            ApiTypes.SendingPermission sendingPermission,
                            Boolean enableContactFeatures,
                            String poolName,
                            int emailSizeLimit,
                            int dailySendLimit)
                     throws Exception
        Create new subaccount and provide most important data about it.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        email - Proper email address.
        password - Current password.
        confirmPassword - Repeat new password.
        requiresEmailCredits - True, if account needs credits to send emails. Otherwise, false
        enableLitmusTest - True, if account is able to send template tests to Litmus. Otherwise, false
        requiresLitmusCredits - True, if account needs credits to send emails. Otherwise, false
        maxContacts - Maximum number of contacts the account can have
        enablePrivateIPRequest - True, if account can request for private IP on its own. Otherwise, false
        sendActivation - True, if you want to send activation email to this account. Otherwise, false
        returnUrl - URL to navigate to after account creation
        sendingPermission - Sending permission setting for account
        enableContactFeatures - True, if you want to use Contact Delivery Tools. Otherwise, false
        poolName - Private IP required. Name of the custom IP Pool which Sub Account should use to send its emails. Leave empty for the default one or if no Private IPs have been bought
        emailSizeLimit - Maximum size of email including attachments in MB's
        dailySendLimit - Amount of emails account can send daily
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addSubAccountCredits

        public void addSubAccountCredits(int credits,
                                 String notes,
                                 ApiTypes.CreditType creditType,
                                 String subAccountEmail,
                                 String publicAccountID)
                          throws Exception
        Add email, template or litmus credits to a sub-account
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        credits - Amount of credits to add
        notes - Specific notes about the transaction
        creditType - Type of credits to add (Email or Litmus)
        subAccountEmail - Email address of sub-account
        publicAccountID - Public key of sub-account to add credits to. Use subAccountEmail or publicAccountID not both.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • changeEmail

        public String changeEmail(String newEmail,
                          String confirmEmail,
                          String sourceUrl)
                   throws Exception
        Change your email address. Remember, that your email address is used as login!
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        newEmail - New email address.
        confirmEmail - New email address.
        sourceUrl - URL from which request was sent.
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        Exception

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(String currentPassword,
                           String newPassword,
                           String confirmPassword)
                    throws Exception
        Create new password for your account. Password needs to be at least 6 characters long.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        currentPassword - Current password.
        newPassword - New password for account.
        confirmPassword - Repeat new password.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • deleteSubAccount

        public void deleteSubAccount(Boolean notify,
                             String subAccountEmail,
                             String publicAccountID)
                      throws Exception
        Deletes specified Subaccount
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        notify - True, if you want to send an email notification. Otherwise, false
        subAccountEmail - Email address of sub-account
        publicAccountID - Public key of sub-account to delete. Use subAccountEmail or publicAccountID not both.
        Throws:
        Exception

                                  String publicAccountID)

        subAccountEmail - Email address of sub-account
        publicAccountID - Public key of sub-account to retrieve sub-account API Key. Use subAccountEmail or publicAccountID not both.

        String
        Throws:
        Exception

      • removeSubAccountCredits

        public void removeSubAccountCredits(ApiTypes.CreditType creditType,
                                    String notes,
                                    String subAccountEmail,
                                    String publicAccountID,
                                    int credits,
                                    Boolean removeAll)
                             throws Exception
        Remove email, template or litmus credits from a sub-account
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        creditType - Type of credits to add (Email or Litmus)
        notes - Specific notes about the transaction
        subAccountEmail - Email address of sub-account
        publicAccountID - Public key of sub-account to remove credits from. Use subAccountEmail or publicAccountID not both.
        credits - Amount of credits to remove
        removeAll - Remove all credits of this type from sub-account (overrides credits if provided)
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parameters:

        count - Number of items.
        notes - Free form field of notes
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateAdvancedOptions

        public ApiTypes.AdvancedOptions updateAdvancedOptions(Boolean enableClickTracking,
                                                      Boolean enableLinkClickTracking,
                                                      Boolean manageSubscriptions,
                                                      Boolean manageSubscribedOnly,
                                                      Boolean transactionalOnUnsubscribe,
                                                      Boolean skipListUnsubscribe,
                                                      Boolean autoTextFromHtml,
                                                      Boolean allowCustomHeaders,
                                                      String bccEmail,
                                                      String contentTransferEncoding,
                                                      Boolean emailNotificationForError,
                                                      String emailNotificationEmail,
                                                      String webNotificationUrl,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationNotifyOncePerEmail,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForSent,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForOpened,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForClicked,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForUnsubscribed,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForAbuseReport,
                                                      Boolean webNotificationForError,
                                                      String hubCallBackUrl,
                                                      String inboundDomain,
                                                      Boolean inboundContactsOnly,
                                                      Boolean lowCreditNotification,
                                                      Boolean enableUITooltips,
                                                      Boolean enableContactFeatures,
                                                      String notificationsEmails,
                                                      String unsubscribeNotificationsEmails,
                                                      String logoUrl,
                                                      Boolean enableTemplateScripting,
                                                      int staleContactScore,
                                                      int staleContactInactiveDays,
                                                      String deliveryReason,
                                                      Boolean tutorialsEnabled)
                                               throws Exception
        Update sending and tracking options of your account.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        enableClickTracking - True, if you want to track clicks. Otherwise, false
        enableLinkClickTracking - True, if you want to track by link tracking. Otherwise, false
        manageSubscriptions - True, if you want to display your labels on your unsubscribe form. Otherwise, false
        manageSubscribedOnly - True, if you want to only display labels that the contact is subscribed to on your unsubscribe form. Otherwise, false
        transactionalOnUnsubscribe - True, if you want to display an option for the contact to opt into transactional email only on your unsubscribe form. Otherwise, false
        skipListUnsubscribe - True, if you do not want to use list-unsubscribe headers. Otherwise, false
        autoTextFromHtml - True, if text BODY of message should be created automatically. Otherwise, false
        allowCustomHeaders - True, if you want to apply custom headers to your emails. Otherwise, false
        bccEmail - Email address to send a copy of all email to.
        contentTransferEncoding - Type of content encoding
        emailNotificationForError - True, if you want bounce notifications returned. Otherwise, false
        emailNotificationEmail - Specific email address to send bounce email notifications to.
        webNotificationUrl - URL address to receive web notifications to parse and process.
        webNotificationNotifyOncePerEmail - True, if you want to receive notifications for each type only once per email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForSent - True, if you want to send web notifications for sent email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForOpened - True, if you want to send web notifications for opened email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForClicked - True, if you want to send web notifications for clicked email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForUnsubscribed - True, if you want to send web notifications for unsubscribed email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForAbuseReport - True, if you want to send web notifications for complaint email. Otherwise, false
        webNotificationForError - True, if you want to send web notifications for bounced email. Otherwise, false
        hubCallBackUrl - URL used for tracking action of inbound emails
        inboundDomain - Domain you use as your inbound domain
        inboundContactsOnly - True, if you want inbound email to only process contacts from your account. Otherwise, false
        lowCreditNotification - True, if you want to receive low credit email notifications. Otherwise, false
        enableUITooltips - True, if account has tooltips active. Otherwise, false
        enableContactFeatures - True, if you want to use Contact Delivery Tools. Otherwise, false
        notificationsEmails - Email addresses to send a copy of all notifications from our system. Separated by semicolon
        unsubscribeNotificationsEmails - Emails, separated by semicolon, to which the notification about contact unsubscribing should be sent to
        logoUrl - URL to your logo image.
        enableTemplateScripting - True, if you want to use template scripting in your emails {{}}. Otherwise, false
        staleContactScore - (0 means this functionality is NOT enabled) Score, depending on the number of times you have sent to a recipient, at which the given recipient should be moved to the Stale status
        staleContactInactiveDays - (0 means this functionality is NOT enabled) Number of days of inactivity for a contact after which the given recipient should be moved to the Stale status
        deliveryReason - Why your clients are receiving your emails.
        tutorialsEnabled -
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.AdvancedOptions
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateCustomBranding

        public void updateCustomBranding(Boolean enablePrivateBranding,
                                 String logoUrl,
                                 String supportLink,
                                 String privateBrandingUrl,
                                 String smtpAddress,
                                 String smtpAlternative,
                                 String paymentUrl)
                          throws Exception
        Update settings of your private branding. These settings are needed, if you want to use Elastic Email under your brand.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        enablePrivateBranding - True: Turn on or off ability to send mails under your brand. Otherwise, false
        logoUrl - URL to your logo image.
        supportLink - Address to your support.
        privateBrandingUrl - Subdomain for your rebranded service
        smtpAddress - Address of SMTP server.
        smtpAlternative - Address of alternative SMTP server.
        paymentUrl - URL for making payments.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateHttpNotification

        public void updateHttpNotification(String url,
                                   Boolean notifyOncePerEmail,
                                   String settings)
                            throws Exception
        Update http notification URL.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        url - URL of notification.
        notifyOncePerEmail - True, if you want to receive notifications for each type only once per email. Otherwise, false
        settings - Http notification settings serialized to JSON
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateProfile

        public void updateProfile(String firstName,
                          String lastName,
                          String address1,
                          String city,
                          String state,
                          String zip,
                          int countryID,
                          Boolean marketingConsent,
                          String address2,
                          String company,
                          String website,
                          String logoUrl,
                          String taxCode,
                          String phone)
                   throws Exception
        Update your profile.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        firstName - First name.
        lastName - Last name.
        address1 - First line of address.
        city - City.
        state - State or province.
        zip - Zip/postal code.
        countryID - Numeric ID of country. A file with the list of countries is available here
        marketingConsent - True if you want to receive newsletters from Elastic Email. Otherwise, false. Empty to leave the current value.
        address2 - Second line of address.
        company - Company name.
        website - HTTP address of your website.
        logoUrl - URL to your logo image.
        taxCode - Code used for tax purposes.
        phone - Phone number
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateSubAccountSettings

        public void updateSubAccountSettings(Boolean requiresEmailCredits,
                                     int monthlyRefillCredits,
                                     Boolean requiresLitmusCredits,
                                     Boolean enableLitmusTest,
                                     int dailySendLimit,
                                     int emailSizeLimit,
                                     Boolean enablePrivateIPRequest,
                                     int maxContacts,
                                     String subAccountEmail,
                                     String publicAccountID,
                                     ApiTypes.SendingPermission sendingPermission,
                                     Boolean enableContactFeatures,
                                     String poolName)
                              throws Exception
        Updates settings of specified subaccount
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        requiresEmailCredits - True, if account needs credits to send emails. Otherwise, false
        monthlyRefillCredits - Amount of credits added to account automatically
        requiresLitmusCredits - True, if account needs credits to send emails. Otherwise, false
        enableLitmusTest - True, if account is able to send template tests to Litmus. Otherwise, false
        dailySendLimit - Amount of emails account can send daily
        emailSizeLimit - Maximum size of email including attachments in MB's
        enablePrivateIPRequest - True, if account can request for private IP on its own. Otherwise, false
        maxContacts - Maximum number of contacts the account can have
        subAccountEmail - Email address of sub-account
        publicAccountID - Public key of sub-account to update. Use subAccountEmail or publicAccountID not both.
        sendingPermission - Sending permission setting for account
        enableContactFeatures - True, if you want to use Contact Delivery Tools. Otherwise, false
        poolName - Name of your custom IP Pool to be used in the sending process
        Throws:
        Exception
